name: Tai Chi Youth Online School
description: Tai Chi Youth is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit charity founded in 1996 improving the lives of "troubled youth" in Utah.  Tai Chi Youth programs teaching Yang Tai Chi Chuan, Yoga, Meditation and Shaolin Kung Fu have been successful in improving the lives of students in elementary schools, middle schools, high schools, YMCA, YWCA, Los Angeles Parks & Recreation, Unitarian Church, Decker Lake Maximum Security Youth Prison, and several rehabilitation centers.  Tai Chi Youth has also taught over 100 senior students in several YMCAs to improve fitness, flexibility and balance.  Chemotherapy patients have been rehabilitated and teen suicides prevented by increasing self-esteem, self-discipline, and improving the school grades of our students.
